## âœ… Checklist

Before submitting this PR, please make sure:

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers/devices (if frontend change)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md file
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation if needed

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have not introduced new dependencies without discussion
- [ ] If I added dependencies, they are necessary and well-maintained
- [ ] I have updated package.json and package-lock.json properly

### Security
- [ ] My code doesn't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not committed sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.)
- [ ] I have reviewed the security implications of my changes

### Git
- [ ] My commits are clear and descriptive
- [ ] I have rebased my branch on the latest main/develop
- [ ] My branch has no merge conflicts
